summary: A full retexture of the elven armor to resemble that of ancient egypt.
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION:

This is the matching armor for my previously released greatsword (found at http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4913). 

I tried to make it evoke ancient egypt. 

-Texture size has been doubled and improved on all pieces. 
-It also comes with its own normal and metallic reflection maps.

Working on weapons/shield/etc right now.

Note that it replaces vanilla elven armor until CK is out.

As before, critics are welcomed :)

INSTALLATION

Copy the data folder to your Skyrim directory. To uninstall simply delete the following files from Skyrim/data/textures/armor/elven/m :

cuirass_d.dds, cuirass_n.dds, cuirass_m.dds
helmet_d.dds, helmet_n.dds, helmet_m.dds
gauntlets_d.dds, gauntlets_n.dds, gauntlets_m.dds
boots_d.dds, boots_n.dds, boots_m.dds

and data/textures/armor/elven/f :

cuirass.dds, cuirass_n.dds, cuirass_m.dds
author: Hairon
